=== Daily builds ===

The daily builds are available in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/+archive/daily-ppa|Indicator Network Daily PPA]]</nowiki>, both for lucid and maverick. To install the PPA:

  <pre>
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:indicator-network-developers/daily-ppa
sudo apt-get update
  </pre>

The packages and their bazaar branches:

* connman
** trunk: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/connman/head|lp:~indicator-network-developers/connman/head]]</nowiki>
** packaging: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/connman/head.packaging|lp:~indicator-network-developers/connman/head.packaging]]</nowiki>
* ofono
** trunk: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/ofono/trunk|lp:~indicator-network-developers/ofono/trunk]]</nowiki>
** packaging: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/ofono/trunk.packaging|lp:~indicator-network-developers/ofono/trunk.packaging]]</nowiki>
* wpasupplicant:
** trunk: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/wpasupplicant/07-series|lp:~indicator-network-developers/wpasupplicant/07-series]]</nowiki>
** packaging: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/wpasupplicant/07-series.packaging|lp:~indicator-network-developers/wpasupplicant/07-series.packaging]]</nowiki>
* indicator-network:
** trunk: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~indicator-network-developers/indicator-network/indicator-network|lp:indicator-network]]</nowiki>
** packaging: <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-desktop/indicator-network/ubuntu|lp:~ubuntu-desktop/indicator-network/ubuntu]]</nowiki>

See also <nowiki>[[ConnMan-Installation|ConnMan installation instructions]]</nowiki>.
